page.title: 20P19 CONTINUED/CREDITS
page.content: Here are comments from 2 adults who live in Renfrew. {Mrs Betty MacKinnon: "I like living in {Renfrew. It's central for everything_ {Glasgow ,Paisley, the coast. The {people are very friendly. The shops {could be better and it's not good for {entertainment. There are only pubs." Mr Campbell Henderson: "I feel sorry for the Kids. There's not much for them to do. The place is clean and there's not much vandalism. I like it better then city living. If it wasn't for the Scouts and my hobbies though I'd be bored. {ACKNOWLEDGMENTS: {Mr McLaughlan and the 4th Year pupils {of Trinity High School,Renfrew. {Mr Mcdiarmid, Mr Johnston and Mrs Jill {Watret and 2nd Year pupils of Renfrew {High School. }
